install.name: Vehicle Manager Search FREE
install.author: Aleksey Pakholkov, Andrey Kvasnevskiy
install.description: Search module free for Vehicle Manager component

param.name: layout
param.label: Alternative Layout
param.description: Use a different layout from the supplied module or overrides in the templates.

param.name: year
param.label: Show Year Lists
param.description: Show or hide search for param 'Year' in the VehicleManager

param.name: price
param.label: Show Price Lists
param.description: Show or hide search for param 'Price' in the VehicleManager

param.name: rent
param.label: Show Availible for rent
param.description: Show or hide search for param 'Availible for rent' in the VehicleManager

param.name: maker
param.label: Show Maker List
param.description: Show and/or search or no for vechicle's maker

param.name: model
param.label: Show Model List
param.description: Show and/or search or no for vechicle's model

param.name: vehicle_type_list
param.label: Show Vehicle Type List
param.description: Show and/or search or no for 'Vechicle type' in the VehicleManager

param.label: Show Drive type
param.description: Show and/or search or no for 'Drive type' in the VehicleManager
